result.title: suggest a good data structure
result.content:
all the elements in the data structure should always be sorted.

I have to be able to insert elements in O(log N) time.

erase elements in O(log N) time.

the distance between two iterators should be found in constant O(1) time.

I have set in C++ STL. But it distance function takes linear time.

Can someone please suggest a good data structure for this?

thanks in advance.
